title: (x) Hellsing - Democratica, ITC Benguiat (customized) {Yves, Nicolai}
content:
Democratica and what? What is that 'g'?   
Is the 'H' Democratica? Are the Democratica letters distorted?   
   
 ![hellsing](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001815im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40064.jpg)
author: kidbritish

comments.content: The g looks a bit [Benguiatï¿½ish](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001815/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-benguiat/book/mac-t1/23470/character/0067/CP4/1/). Heavily distorted of course...
